name: Bittersweet Starlight
description:
Sorrel has a conversation with his good friend Aster in the place they always meet. What will they talk about? Play to find out. :)

A short BL kinetic novel made in a week's time for the O2A2 Jam 2022.

Contains:

Fairies!
1000 words
1 Background
1 Sprite
1 Music track
1 Ending (no choices)

Credits:

Made by the FoxySquid Games team;

Art and proofreading by squidcolas

Writing and programming by Foxpancakes

Assets not made by us;

Music by lolurio

Thank you for playing! <3
